1208 Do these people even hear themselves?! 💩   SHITPOST   💩 posted 1 day ago by sebster 141 comments award share download report block
141 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save SHILL_DETECTOR 200 points 1 day ago RayCist Man  lol *its parody guys permalink award report block reply White-tailed_Eagle 45 points 1 day ago Ah, I did not see that at first. But I imagine there are some EBT recipiants who think this way. permalink parent award report block reply Rydanovich 28 points 1 day ago There genuinely are. The homeless camp where I live is packed with them. permalink parent award report block reply mikethemarine 9 points 1 day ago see, they even think they deserve to eat for free, Try getting a job and buying it at the grocery store like the rest of us have to and also want to. Nothing in this world is free, so when you commit a crime and steal it, you have to pay for it with your time in prison, your payment becomes time in your life which can NEVER be recovered. permalink parent award report block reply The_Return_of_User_x 4 points 1 day ago EBT was used as reparations. Slave boat times are over. No one alive today was ever a slave. Go to work. permalink parent award report block reply view 1 more comments... Standingoak 1 points 1 day ago Animals just following their training.  Remove our trainers , then train them without the hearts of EVIL in our current trainers. permalink parent award report block reply view 2 more comments... BaldyGull 5 points 1 day ago By homeless camp, do you mean the cities of Portland or San Francisco, or like you actually live in a tent somewhere? permalink parent award report block reply Rydanovich 2 points 1 day ago I don't. I was homeless a couple years back. The homeless camp is little more than a section of land the city set out for people to legally tent down. Previously they were set up beneath the overpass, but the department of transportation took issue with it, so they were made to move. I didn't stay like that. First thing I did was hit the streets for job options, got working, filed with the housing authority, got an apartment. permalink parent award report block reply view 2 more comments... deleted 2 points 1 day ago Rydanovich 2 points 1 day ago I was homeless a couple years back. I'm not currently. permalink parent award report block reply TXPatriot_73 10 points 1 day ago I imagine it's the same reason they think white people don't season their food. permalink parent award report block reply lul_cheto 3 points 1 day ago Yeh, tell a French, Spanish or Italian person they dont know how to season their food.. see how that works out. permalink parent award report block reply 4444444444444 2 points 1 day ago That's an old boomer thing.  All my boomer family eats things bland as fuck.   And way over cooked. permalink parent award report block reply BaldyGull 3 points 1 day ago That is a bad cooking thing. I know some old people that cook great. My parents think season salt is a little too razzle dazzle for most dishes, and think boiling is an acceptable way to cook chicken breast, even if you aren't shredding it. permalink parent award report block reply view 4 more comments... RetardIsMyMiddleName 3 points 1 day ago So when faced with a lie, instead of admitting to yourself you got fooled, you decide to make up a story about how the lie may still be real... permalink parent award report block reply White-tailed_Eagle 1 points 1 day ago What? I do not live in the US but imagine there are some people who have been on EBT for a long time. Some of those people would have no plans to get  off EBT so would be looking for other welfare to keep their (parasitic) lifestyle. I did think the twitter account was real at first until I reread it. I am just assuming that out of the millions of  people on EBT right now, some of them just watnt the government to feed them forever. But who knows, maybe I am wrong and 100% of EBT recepients are people who genuinly need it and will leave the program when they no longer need it. permalink parent award report block reply minttea2 2 points 1 day ago https://x.com/TheOnlyDSC/status/1988066729797546429 permalink parent award report block reply patrioticwinning3 -2 points 1 day ago He's a Reverend too!  This guy is telling Church goers this shit! permalink parent award report block reply deleted 11 points 1 day ago Region 8 points 1 day ago I don’t know how much experience you have being around ghetto blacks, but this post was 100% believable. permalink parent award report block reply alfredbester 8 points 1 day ago Ha, I like the idea but a year is way too much. Maybe a little flair next to your screen name for a couple weeks. permalink parent award report block reply BaldyGull 6 points 1 day ago Dunce cap where the handshake gets displayed. permalink parent award report block reply CyanScales 4 points 1 day ago Parody Account 100% https://x.com/RevRayCistman permalink parent award report block reply Run_over_Antifa 3 points 1 day ago Just need Covered Income ;) permalink parent award report block reply DCSucks 1 points 1 day ago Parody, BUT millions agree. permalink parent award report block reply load 6 more comments... maverick202 61 points 1 day ago Parody account.. Good catch. permalink parent award report block reply DManthey 16 points 1 day ago Parody account, but the point still stands lol. permalink parent award report block reply TheAftermath 8 points 1 day ago Very true. permalink parent award report block reply maverick202 5 points 1 day ago 💯 permalink parent award report block reply snoopy3210 2 points 1 day ago Yep thanks to elon 8$ verification permalink parent award report block reply Raetchel 35 points 1 day ago as it should be i don't 'eat for free' you shouldn't eat at my table uninvited permalink award report block reply BlackCrimesMatter 12 points 1 day ago How dare you! They built tha cuntriiii n sheiiit. Their culcha is cancer. They glorify violence, theft, drugs, prostitution, welfare culture, scams, and hating whitey. A lot of them are also arguing that EBT is simply reparations that must be paid. Seriously, just look: https://patriots.win/p/1ARK0Q4JSS/so-glad-we-are-rewarding-these-w/c permalink parent award report block reply HunterBidensPC 6 points 1 day ago But ThATs rAciSt! permalink parent award report block reply skuts 18 points 1 day ago Why do you expect to eat for free, my Negro? permalink award report block reply jaeger 12 points 1 day ago Show me in the Constitution where it says we have to keep pets. permalink award report block reply Scot 11 points 1 day ago Rev "racist man".

Thanks to the Schumer shutdown.  Looking forward to when the 20 hour work or volunteer requirements start. permalink award report block reply bratt 5 points 1 day ago No. I'd prefer that criminals pay all the expenses of their incarceration. If not, they can try to work it off or they can sell some organs. permalink award report block reply Greenhills 5 points 1 day ago Gross. permalink award report block reply YoopersGodsCountry 4 points 1 day ago NO SUCH THING AS A FREE LUNCH DARKIE permalink award report block reply DingleBalls 4 points 1 day ago Or, maybe stop thinking you should "eat for free"? The S in SNAP stands for SUPPLEMENTAL. Meaning, you are using it to SUPPLEMENT the fact your current income from the JOB you're supposed to have, doesn't cover enough for you to meet nutritional needs for you or your family. Its not a "eat free for life" card. permalink award report block reply HumblePepe 3 points 1 day ago This is a fun parody account. permalink award report block reply Eros789 3 points 1 day ago Reverend Ray Cistman? Every living being MUST WORK.
